definition.text: Ok, you're not actually going to be teleporting, nor will you bend spacetime, but it almost feels like it! It's time to learn to use the design space map.

paragraphs.text: I said earlier that the design space is huge, and I meant it! Going from one corner to the opposite would take hundreds of clicks and drags. While using the keyboard allows you to develop neck-breaking speeds, it's not as cool as teleporting! This is how it works:
Right-click to open the map and left-click anywhere to go to that specific spot!
Look at me on the bottom-left corner of the design space? Now you know where to find me!
